# TypingMind

> TypingMind is an advanced AI chat interface that supports multiple LLM models including GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and custom models. It offers enhanced features like system prompts, parameter controls, plugins, knowledge base integration, document upload, and voice capabilities.

TypingMind provides a feature-rich interface for interacting with various AI models, with extensive customization options and productivity tools. It can be used as a web application or installed as a PWA, and offers both individual and team workspace environments.

## Getting Started

- [Install TypingMind App](https://docs.typingmind.com/install-typingmind-app): Instructions for installing TypingMind as a PWA on desktop and mobile
- [Quickstart](https://docs.typingmind.com/quickstart): Essential guide to getting started with TypingMind
- [Feature List](https://docs.typingmind.com/feature-list): Comprehensive overview of all available features
- [Changelog](https://docs.typingmind.com/changelog): Latest updates and feature additions

## AI Models

- [Manage & Connect AI Models](https://docs.typingmind.com/manage-connect-ai-models): How to connect and manage different AI models
- [Available AI Models](https://docs.typingmind.com/feature-list#available-ai-models): Information about supported AI models including GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and custom models
- [Model Configuration](https://docs.typingmind.com/feature-list#model-configuration): Details on configuring model parameters like system instructions, temperature, and tokens

## Core Features

- [System Prompt](https://docs.typingmind.com/system-prompt): How to customize system instructions for AI models
- [Parameter Settings](https://docs.typingmind.com/parameter-settings): Configure model parameters like temperature, top_p, and max tokens
- [Chat Management](https://docs.typingmind.com/chat-management): Organize and manage your conversations with folders, search, and tags
- [General Settings](https://docs.typingmind.com/general-settings): Configure general application settings and preferences

## Prompts and Agents

- [Prompts](https://docs.typingmind.com/prompts): Main prompts documentation page
- [Use Prompt Library](https://docs.typingmind.com/use-prompt-library): Create, manage, and use prompt templates
- [Prompt Examples](https://docs.typingmind.com/prompt-examples): Examples of effective prompts
- [Automatic Prompt Caching](https://docs.typingmind.com/automatic-prompt-caching): How prompt caching works to reduce token usage
- [Prompt Chaining](https://docs.typingmind.com/prompt-chaining): Connect multiple prompts together
- [Message Syntax](https://docs.typingmind.com/message-syntax): Special syntax for message formatting

## AI Agents

- [AI Agents Overview](https://docs.typingmind.com/ai-agents-overview): Introduction to AI agents in TypingMind
- [Write Effective Instruction for AI Agent](https://docs.typingmind.com/write-effective-instruction-for-ai-agent): Guidelines for creating effective agent instructions
- [AI Agent Examples](https://docs.typingmind.com/ai-agent-examples): Example AI agents and their configurations
- [Dynamic Context via API](https://docs.typingmind.com/dynamic-context-via-api): How to provide dynamic context to agents
- [Dynamic Context Use Cases](https://docs.typingmind.com/dynamic-context-use-cases): Use cases for dynamic context
- [Build Multi-Agent Workflows](https://docs.typingmind.com/build-multi-agent-workflows): Creating workflows with multiple agents

## Plugins

- [Use TypingMind Plugin](https://docs.typingmind.com/use-typingmind-plugin): How to use built-in plugins
- [Build a TypingMind Plugin](https://docs.typingmind.com/build-a-typingmind-plugin): Create your own plugins
- [User-contributed Plugins](https://docs.typingmind.com/user-contributed-plugins): Community-created plugins
- [Share / Import plugins](https://docs.typingmind.com/share-import-plugins): How to share and import plugins
- [Server Side vs. Client Side Plugin](https://docs.typingmind.com/server-side-vs-client-side-plugin): Different types of plugins
- [OAuth 2.0 Authentication for Plugins](https://docs.typingmind.com/oauth-2.0-authentication-for-plugins): Authentication for plugins
- [Create a Plugin Server URL](https://docs.typingmind.com/create-a-plugin-server-url): Setting up plugin servers
- [Interactive Canvas (Artifacts)](https://docs.typingmind.com/interactive-canvas-artifacts): Using the interactive canvas feature
- [Web search & Image search](https://docs.typingmind.com/web-search-image-search): Search plugins
- [Perplexity Search](https://docs.typingmind.com/perplexity-search): Using Perplexity for search
- [Market News](https://docs.typingmind.com/market-news): Financial news plugin

## Knowledge and Data Integration

- [RAG Knowledge Base](https://docs.typingmind.com/rag-knowledge-base): Create and use knowledge bases for retrieval-augmented generation
- [Getting started with RAG](https://docs.typingmind.com/rag-knowledge-base#getting-started): Introduction to RAG in TypingMind
- [Upload your files](https://docs.typingmind.com/rag-knowledge-base#upload-your-files): How to upload files to the knowledge base
- [Use Knowledge Base in Chat](https://docs.typingmind.com/rag-knowledge-base#use-knowledge-base-in-chat): Using knowledge base in conversations
- [Connect Your Own Knowledge Base](https://docs.typingmind.com/rag-knowledge-base#connect-your-own-knowledge-base): Connecting external knowledge bases
- [Upload and Chat with Files](https://docs.typingmind.com/upload-and-chat-with-files): Upload documents and chat about their contents

## Voice Features

- [Text-to-speech](https://docs.typingmind.com/text-to-speech): Convert AI responses to spoken audio
- [Voice Input (Speech to Text)](https://docs.typingmind.com/voice-input): Use voice commands and dictation with the AI

## Advanced Features

- [Model Context Protocol (MCP) in TypingMind](https://docs.typingmind.com/model-context-protocol-(mcp)-in-typingmind): Using MCP with TypingMind
- [Setup MCP in TypingMind License Version](https://docs.typingmind.com/model-context-protocol-(mcp)-in-typingmind#setup-mcp-in-typingmind-license-version): MCP setup for license version
- [Setup MCP in TypingMind Teams Version](https://docs.typingmind.com/model-context-protocol-(mcp)-in-typingmind#setup-mcp-in-typingmind-teams-version): MCP setup for teams version
- [Typing Mind Extensions](https://docs.typingmind.com/typing-mind-extensions): Extensions for TypingMind
- [Integrations](https://docs.typingmind.com/integrations): Connect with external services and tools

## Self-hosting and Deployment

- [Static Self-host](https://docs.typingmind.com/static-self-host): Self-hosting TypingMind as a static application

## Account Management

- [Manage License & Devices](https://docs.typingmind.com/manage-license-devices): Managing your license and devices
- [Cloud Sync & Backup](https://docs.typingmind.com/cloud-sync-backup): Syncing and backing up your data

## TypingMind Teams

- [TypingMind Team](https://docs.typingmind.com/typingmind-team): Information about team workspaces and collaboration features
